首页 > 师资状况 > 教职工名录 > 高性能计算研究所 > 正高 > 正文

武永卫
职称 教授 电话 62796341
邮箱 wuyw@tsinghua.edu.cn

姓名：武永卫

职称：教授

电话：62796341

邮箱：wuyw@tsinghua.edu.cn

个人主页：http://madsys.cs.tsinghua.edu.cn/~yongweiwu/

教育背景

理学学士 (计算数学), 兰州大学, 中国, 1996

理学硕士 (计算数学), 兰州大学, 中国, 1999

理学博士 (应用数学), 中科院系统所, 中国, 2002

社会兼职

19th IEEE/ACM CCGrid 2019,29th IEEE/ACM SC 2016, 22nd IEEE/ACM HPDC 2013等国际会议程序委员会主席/委员

IEEE Transactions on Sustainable Computing指导委员会委员（2015–2019）

IEEE Transaction on Cloud Computing 编委（2014 – 2019）

IEEE Cloud Computing编委（2015–2018）

Journal of Grid Computing 编委（2013–今）

Journal of Cluster Computing 编委（2013–今）

研究领域

并行与分布式处理, 云计算，存储系统

研究概况

开展计算机系统方面的研究工作，专注于并行与分布式系统的设计、实现、评价和应用等。具体的研究方向包括运行时环境、数据存储与管理、虚拟化、资源管理调度、性能分析、分布式协同与一致性、可靠性与容错等。

奖励与荣誉

IEEE Fellow （2023）

AAIA Fellow （2023）

中国计算机学会科技进步卓越奖：AtlasGraph大规模图数据分析平台 （2021）

世界互联网领先科技成果奖：基于分层API规范的云操作系统生态建设 （2021）

华为奥林帕斯奖 （2021）

中国电子学会科技进步一等奖：高可靠自维护存储系统核心技术及产业化（2020）

中国电子学会科技进步特等奖：飞天云操作系统核心技术及产业化（2017）

国家技术发明二等奖：面向社区共享的高可用云存储系统（2015）

国家科技进步二等奖：中国教育科研网格（2008）

中创软件人才奖（2011）

Tsinghua Science and Technology 2015：最佳论文奖（2015）

FSE 2014：ACM SIGSOFT杰出论文奖（2014）

IMIS 2011：最佳论文奖（2011）

ScalCom 2009：最佳论文奖（2009）

学术成果

[1] RF-RPC: Remote Fetching PRC Paradigm for RDMA-Enabled Network Yongwei Wu, Teng Ma, Maomeng Su, Mingxing Zhang, Kang Chen, Zhenyu Guo, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS),2018.

[2] ReGraph: A Graph Processing Framework that Alternately Shrinks and Rapartitions the Graph Xue Li, Mingxing Zhang, Kang Chen, Yongwei Wu, 32nd ACM International Conference on Supercomputing (ICS 2018).

[3] Low Latency RNN Inference with Cellular Batching Pin Gao, Lingfan Yu, Yongwei Wu, Jinyang Li, 13th European Conference on Computer Systems (EuroSys 2018).

[4] Wonderland: A Novel Abstraction-Based Out-Of-Core Gragh Processing System Mingxing Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Youwei Zhuo, Xuehai Qian, Chenyin Huan, Kang Chen, 23rd Architectural Support for Programming Languages and Operating Systems (ASPLOS 2018).

[5] GraphP: Reducing Communication of PIM-based Graph Processing with Efficient Data Partition Mingxing Zhang, Youwei Zhuo, Chao Wang, Mingyu Gao, Yongwei Wu, Kang Chen, Christos Kozyrakis, Xuehai Qian, 24th IEEE International Symposium on High-Performance Computer Architecture (HPCA 2018).

[6] Squeezing out All the Value of Loaded Data: An Out-of-core Graph Processing System with Reduced Disk I/O Zhiyuan Ai, Mingxing Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Xuehai Qian, Kang Chen, Weimin Zheng, 2017 USENIX Annual Technical Conference (ATC 2017).

[7] RFP: When RPC is Faster than Server-Bypass with RDMA. Maomeng Su, Mingxing Zhang, Kang Chen, ZhenyuGuo, Yongwei Wu, 12th European Conference on Computer Systems Systems (EuroSys 2017).

[8] High Performance Graph Processing with Locality Oriented Design. Pin Gao, Mingxing Zhang, Kang Chen, Yongwei Wu, Weimin Zheng, IEEE Transactions on Computers (ToC), 2017.

[9] DudeTM: Building Durable Transactions with Decoupling for Persistent Memory. Mengxing Liu, Mingxing Zhang, Kang Chen, Xuehai Qian, Yongwei Wu, Weimin Zheng, Jinglei Ren, 22nd Architectural Support for Programming Languages and Operating Systems (ASPLOS 2017).

[10] Exploring the Hidden Dimension in Graph Processing. Mingxing Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Kang Chen, Xuehai Qian, Xue Li and Weimin Zheng, 12th USENIX Symposium on Operating Systems Design and Implementation (OSDI 2016).

[11] Measuring and Optimizing Distributed Array Programs. Mingxing Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Kang Chen, Teng Ma, Weimin Zheng, 42nd International Conference on Very Large Data Bases (VLDB 2016).

[12] A Lightweight System for Detecting and Tolerating Concurrency Bugs. Mingxing Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Shan Lu, Shanxiang Qi, Jinglei Ren, and Weimin Zheng, IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering (TSE), 2016, Vol. 42, Issue 10, pp.899-917.

[13] PCAF: Scalable, High Precision k-NN Search using Principal Component Analysis based Filtering. Huan Feng, David Eyers, Steven Mills, Yongwei Wu, Zhiyi Huang, 45th International Conference on Parallel Processing (ICPP 2016).

[14] MARS: Mobile Application Relaunching Speed-up through Flash-Aware Page Swapping. Weichao GUO, Kang CHEN, Huan Feng, Yongwei WU, Rui ZHANG, Weimin ZHENG, IEEE Transactions on Computers (ToC), 2016, Vol. 65, Issue 3, pp.916-928.

[15] Systematic Data Placement Optimization in Multi-Cloud Storage for Complex Requirements. Maomeng Su, Lei Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Kang Chen, Keqin Li, IEEE Transactions on Computers (ToC), 2016, Vol. 65, Issue 6, pp.1964-1977.

[16] HEADS-JOIN: Efficient Earth Mover’s Distance Similarity Joins on Hadoop. Jin Huang, Rui Zhang, RajkumarBuyya, Jian Chen, Yongwei Wu, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS), 2016, Vol. 27, No. 6, pp.1660-1673.

[17] Top-k Spatio-Textual Similarity Join. Huiqi Hu, Guoliang Li, ZhifengBao, Jianhua Feng, Yongwei Wu, Zhiguo Gong, Yaoqiang Xu, IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE), 2016, Vol. 28, No. 2, pp.551-565.

[18] Cloud Performance Modeling with Benchmark Evaluation of Elastic Scaling Strategies. Kai Hwang, Xiaoyin Bai, Yue Shi, Muyang Li, Wenguang Chen, Yongwei Wu, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS), 2016, Vol. 27, No. 1, pp.130-143.

[19] Accelerating MapReduce on Commodity Clusters: An SSD-Empowered Approach. Bo Wang, Jinlei Jiang, Yongwei Wu, Guangwen Yang, Keqin Li, IEEE Transactions on Big Data, 2016, pp.1-1.

[20] ThyNVM: Enabling Software-Transparent Crash Consistency in Persistent Memory Systems. Jinglei Ren, Jishen Zhao, Samira Khan, Jongmoo Choi, Yongwei Wu, and OnurMutlu, 48th Annual IEEE/ACM International Symposium on Microarchitecture (MICRO 2015).

[21] Sliding Mode Congestion Control for Data Center Ethernet Networks. Wanchun Jiang, Fengyuan Ren, Ran Shu, Yongwei Wu, Chuang Lin, IEEE Transactions on Computers (ToC), 2015, Vol. 64, Issue 9, pp.2675-2690.

[22] Associative Big Data Sharing in Community Clouds – The MeePo Approach. Yongwei Wu, Maomeng Su, Weimin Zheng, Kai Hwang, Albert Y.Zomaya, IEEE Cloud Computing, 2015, Vol. 2, No. 6, pp.64-73.

[23] What is Wrong With the Transmission? — A Comprehensive Study on Message Passing Related Bugs. Mingxing Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Kang Chen, Weimin Zheng, 44th International Conference on Parallel Processing (ICPP 2015).

[24] Memory-Centric Data Storage for Mobile Systems. Jinglei REN, Chieh-Jan Mike Liang, Yongwei WU, Thomas Moscibroda, 2015 USENIX Annual Technical Conference (ATC 2015).

[25] Bidding for Highly Available Services with Low Price in Spot Instance Market. Weichao GUO, Kang CHEN, Yongwei WU, Weimin ZHENG, 24th International ACM Symposium on High-Performance Parallel and Distributed Computing (HPDC 2015).

[26] AI: A Lightweight System for Tolerating Concurrency Bugs(ACM SIGSOFT 2014 Distinguished Paper Award).

Mingxing ZHANG, Yongwei WU, Shan LU, Shangxiang QI, Jinglei REN, Weimin ZHENG, 22nd ACM SIGSOFT International Symposium on Foundations of Software Engineering (FSE 2014).

[27] When Paxos Meets Erasure Code: Reduce Network and Storage Cost in State Machine Replication. Shuai MU, Kang CHEN, Yongwei WU, Weimin ZHENG, 23rd International ACM Symposium on High-Performance Parallel and Distributed Computing (HPDC 2014).

[28] Analysis of Backward Congestion Notification with Delay for Enhanced Ethernet Networks. Wanchun Jiang, Fengyuan Ren, Yongwei Wu, Chuang Lin, Stojmenovic Ivan, IEEE Transactions on Computers (ToC), Vol. 63, No. 11, 2014.

[29] Modeling of Distributed File Systems for Practical Performance Analysis. Yongwei WU, Feng YE, Kang CHEN, Weimin ZHENG, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS), 2014, Vol. 25, No. 1, pp.156-166.

[30] NO2: Speeding Up Parallel Processing of Massive Compute-Intensive Tasks. Yongwei WU, Weichao GUO, Jinglei REN, Xun ZHAO, Weimin ZHENG, IEEE Transactions on Computers (ToC), 2014, Vol. 63, Issue 10, pp.2487-2499.

[31] Quatrain: Accelerating Data Aggregation between Multiple Layers. Jinglei REN, Yongwei WU, Meiqi ZHU, Weimin ZHENG, IEEE Transactions on Computers (ToC), 2014, Vol. 63, Issue 5, pp.1207-1219.

[32] Guarantee Strict Fairness and Utilize Prediction Better in Parallel Job Scheduling. Yulai YUAN, Yongwei WU, Weimin ZHENG, Keqin LI, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS), 2014, Vol. 25, No. 4, pp.971-981.

[33] Liquid: A Scalable Deduplication File System for Virtual Machine Images. Xun ZHAO, Yang ZHANG, Yongwei WU, Kang CHEN, Jinlei JIANG, Keqin LI, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS), 2014, Vol. 25, No. 5, pp.1257-1266.

[34] Response Time based Optimal Web Service Selection. Waseem Ahmed, Yongwei WU, Weimin ZHENG, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS), 2013, Vol. 26, No. 2, pp.551-561.

[35] Attribute-Aware Data Aggregation Using Potential-Based Dynamic Routing in Wireless Sensor Networks. Fengyuan REN, Jiao ZHANG, Yongwei WU, Tao HE, Canfeng CHEN, Chuang LIN, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS), 2013, Vol. 24, No. 5, pp.881-892.

[36] Droplet: a Distributed Solution of Data Deduplication. Yang ZHANG, Yongwei WU, Guangwen YANG, 13th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Grid Computing (Grid 2012).

[37] Location-Aware MapReduce in Virtual Cloud. Yifeng GENG, Shimin CHEN, Yongwei WU, Ryan WU, Guangwen YANG, Weimin ZHENG, 42nd International Conference on Parallel Processing (ICPP 2011).

[38] Task Optimization Based on CPU Pipeline Technique in Multicore System (Best Paper Award). Bo WANG, Yongwei WU, Weimin ZHENG, 5th International Conference on Innovative Mobile and Internet Services in Ubiquitous Computing (IMIS 2011).

[39] Automatically Constructing Trusted Cluster Computing Environment. Yongwei WU, Gang CHEN, Jia LIU, Rui FANG, Xiaomeng HUANG, Guangwen YANG, Weimin ZHENG, Journal of Supercomputing, 2011, Vol. 55, No. 1, pp.51-68.

[40] Optimization of sub-query processing in distributed data integration systems. Gang CHEN, Yongwei WU, Jia LIU, Guangwen YANG, Weimin ZHENG, Journal of Network and Computer Applications, 2011, Vol. 34, No. 4, pp.1035-1042.

[41] PV-EASY: A Strict Fairness Guaranteed and Prediction Enabled Scheduler in Parallel Job Scheduling. Yulai YUAN, Guangwen YANG, Yongwei WU, Weimin ZHENG, 19th International ACM Symposium on High-Performance Parallel and Distributed Computing (HPDC 2010).

[42] Adaptive workload prediction of grid performance in confidence windows. Yongwei WU, Kai HWANG, Yulai YUAN, Weimin ZHENG, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS), 2010, Vol. 21, No. 7, pp.925-938.

[43] Improving grid performance by dynamically deploying applications. Yongwei WU, Gang CHEN, Jia LIU, Rui FANG, Guangwen YANG, Weimin ZHENG, Concurrency Computation Practice and Experience (CCPE), 2010, Vol. 22, No. 13, pp.1945-1967.

[44] An Adaptive Task-level Fault-tolerant Approach to Grid. Yongwei WU, Yulai YUAN, Guangwen YANG, Weimin ZHENG, Journal of Supercomputing, 2010, Vol. 51, No. 2, pp.97-114.
